title: suspicious refund request
extract: Suspicious Email enquiry from a buyer. ... The catch is that the seller will refund the excess amount to the buyer based on the information provided in the 'fake' receipt meaning the scammer will often end up with extra money in their pocket as well as the item originally listed for sale.Dec 20, 2017
